summary: Have you ever wanted to drop those pesky Black Books but they just don't want to leave your inventory? No more!
descriptionHtml:
[color="red"]***IMPORTANT***[/color]
Do not use this mod before you have completed all activities within Miraak's temple. There is a chance it will prevent you from initiating conversation with him when you read Waking Dreams. I don't know what causes this, so be careful when installing this mod.

Fed up with lugging about these bulky and heavy tomes everywhere I went, I decided to do something about it. This is a simple fix that makes each of the Black Books droppable. They should now behave like any other book when you aren't reading them for the free perks from Mr Mora. This should be compatible with pretty much any other mod out there (I don't know how it will interact with other mods that allow you to drop these books, though).

This is a simple mod and it's going to stay simple.
author: TheInquisitor
